name: tspersistentvector
description: Persistent Vector implementation, Java PVec port to TS

scripts.test: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --lib es5,es2015.iterable,dom --experimentalDecorators -t es5 --downlevelIteration test.ts && ./node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter html --reporter text ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test.js
